alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 9:01PM EDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Michigan... Menominee River below Twin Falls Dam-Iron Mountain affecting Florence, Dickinson, Marinette and Menominee Counties. .Snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Menominee River below Twin Falls Dam-Iron Mountain. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, Water approaches a few homes or mobile homes near the River Bend campground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:42 PM CDT Friday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:42 PM CDT Friday was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 20.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
